# Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Progress
- Project requirements clarified: PHP backend API server, MySQL database, PHP frontend.
- Project scaffolded: backend/api.php, backend/setup.sql, frontend/index.php created.
- Customization complete: Example API and frontend implemented.
- No extensions required for PHP/SQL.
- Compilation: PHP syntax checked, no errors.
- Task created: PHP built-in server for frontend launched on port 8080.
- Project launched: Accessible at http://localhost:8080
- Documentation complete: README.md and copilot-instructions.md updated.
